      • existsInDabatase

        public boolean existsInDabatase(java.lang.String pseudo,
                                java.lang.String password)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Checks in the couple (pseudo, password) matches an entry of the User table in Database
        Parameters:
        pseudo - Name of the user
        password - Password of the user : non encrypted
        Returns:
        true it matches an entry, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if there's a problem with the request
